data.title: Building Bridges, Strengthening Communities
data.subtitle: The Australian Nepalese Multicultural Centre is dedicated to fostering cultural diversity, community engagement, and supporting our members through various programs and initiatives.

news.title: ANMC Annual Dashain Celebration 2024
news.content: Join us for our annual Dashain celebration with traditional music, dance, and authentic Nepalese cuisine.
news.excerpt: Annual Dashain celebration with traditional activities and community gathering.

news.title: New Community Programs Launched
news.content: ANMC is excited to announce new community programs including language classes, cultural workshops, and youth activities.
news.excerpt: Discover our new range of community programs designed to strengthen cultural connections.

events.title: Community Picnic 2025
events.description: Annual community picnic at Riverside Park with games, food, and entertainment for all ages.
events.content: Join us for our annual community picnic featuring traditional games, delicious food, and live entertainment. A perfect opportunity to connect with fellow community members.

events.title: Cultural Dance Workshop
events.description: Learn traditional Nepalese dances with experienced instructors.
events.content: Experience the beauty of Nepalese culture through traditional dance. Our experienced instructors will teach you basic steps and cultural significance.

projects.title: Community Garden Initiative
projects.description: Creating sustainable community gardens to promote local food production and community engagement.
projects.content: Our community garden initiative aims to create sustainable spaces where community members can grow their own vegetables and herbs while learning about sustainable practices.

projects.title: Youth Leadership Program
projects.description: Developing leadership skills in young community members through mentorship and training.
projects.content: A comprehensive program designed to develop leadership skills in young people aged 16-25, providing mentorship, training, and real-world experience.

about_us.title: About ANMC
about_us.subtitle: Building Bridges, Strengthening Communities
about_us.mission: To foster cultural diversity, promote community engagement, and support the social, cultural, and economic wellbeing of the Australian Nepalese community.
about_us.vision: A vibrant, inclusive community where cultural heritage is celebrated and preserved while embracing Australian values and opportunities.
about_us.history: Established in 1998, the Australian Nepalese Multicultural Centre has been serving the community for over 25 years, growing from a small group of families to a thriving organization representing thousands of community members.

facilities.name: Main Community Hall
facilities.description: Large multipurpose hall suitable for events, meetings, and celebrations.

facilities.name: Meeting Rooms
facilities.description: Smaller meeting rooms perfect for committee meetings and workshops.

facilities.name: Cultural Center
facilities.description: Dedicated space for cultural activities, classes, and workshops.
